      import java.io.*;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        int n = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
        String[] str = br.readLine().split("");
        int sum = 0;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            sum += Integer.parseInt(str[i]);
        }
        
        System.out.print(sum);
    }
}

      ë°©ë²• 1: charAt() ì‚¬ìš©

      import java.io.*;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        int n = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
        String str = br.readLine();
        int sum = 0;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            sum += str.charAt(i) - '0';
        }
        
        System.out.print(sum);
    }
}

      ë°©ë²• 2: toCharArray()

      import java.io.*;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        br.readLine();  // nì€ ì‚¬ìš© ì•ˆ í•¨
        char[] chars = br.readLine().toCharArray();
        int sum = 0;
        
        for (char c : chars) {
            sum += c - '0';
        }
        
        System.out.print(sum);
    }
}

      ğŸ“Š ì„±ëŠ¥ ë¹„êµ

      ë°©ë²• ë©”ëª¨ë¦¬ ì‹œê°„ íŠ¹ì§•
      split() 14404KB 104ms ë°°ì—´ ìƒì„±
      charAt() 14200KB 100ms ë” ë¹ ë¦„
      toCharArray() 14200KB 100ms for-each ê°€ëŠ¥

      ğŸ¯ ê°œì„  í›„ ì½”ë“œ

      import java.io.*;

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
        BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        int n = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
        String str = br.readLine();
        int sum = 0;
        
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            sum += str.charAt(i) - '0';
        }
        
        System.out.print(sum);
    }
}

      í•µì‹¬: '0'ì„ ë¹¼ë©´ ìˆ«ìë¡œ ë³€í™˜ (ASCII ì´ìš©)

      ë¬¸ìë¥¼ ìˆ«ìë¡œ ë³€í™˜:

      • '5' - '0' = 5
      • charAt()ì´ split() + parseInt()ë³´ë‹¤ ë¹ ë¦„
